backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing leads in a persistent Map with methods to add a lead, fetch one by ID, or return all leads.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module converting old lead records to the new extended lead structure by adding empty fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, dark mode, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling client-side routing to homepage, Control Framework page, or Industries page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, attribution, and Caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: Lead generation form collecting user and company details with validation and submission via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: Industry-focused lead form capturing business details and operational bottlenecks with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact information and a button to schedule a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Showcases the CONTROL framework steps with images and navigation to a detailed page.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Section emphasizing founder dependency challenges and Inovics’ solution messaging.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Closing call‑to‑action prompting users to book a strategy call with smooth scroll to contact.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner introducing Inovics’ value proposition with CTAs to contact or explore the framework.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Highlights target industries with cards describing benefits for each family business segment.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays a three-card insights grid with titles, excerpts, and categories, including decorative visuals.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Renders a list of business outcomes with icons and a dashboard image mockup.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Shows key operational problems using icons and highlights systems issues as the core challenge.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Outlines a four-step transformation process with numbered cards and a background visual.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Presents three core feature pillars—control, clarity, continuity—with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar supporting route links and smooth-scrolling hash links with active-section tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Handles lead form submission through the backend actor with loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a custom color system matching brand palette, plus global styles and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Triggers an email composition window for requesting a strategy call.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
Renders the CONTROL framework marketing page with hero content, CTA, and detailed step-by-step methodology sections.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Implements the Industries We Serve page with hero, industry focus sections, lead-gen form integration, scrolling, and a copyable prompt.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom INOVICS colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for building INOVICS website pages.
